name: The Little Mermaid II: Pinball Frenzy
name_original: The Little Mermaid II: Pinball Frenzy
description: With Disney's - The Little Mermaid II: Pinball Frenzy, it's pinball under the sea! Send your pinball zipping around two Disney's The Little Mermaid-themed tables. One based on the feature film, Disney's The Little Mermaid, and the other on the video release Disney's The Little Mermaid II: Return to the Sea. Compete on two pinball tables and 16 pinball-based mini-games as you attempt to rescue shipwrecked sailors and battle Ursula for the trident!
